nodes.text: Sometime prior to 34 ABY, the junk boss Unkar Plutt was kidnapped by the Zendiat Collective in order to recover a J9 worker drone that was sold to him. The scavenger Rey tricked them, and was able to recover the junk boss and take him back to Niima Outpost, where Krynodd had taken over. For her efforts, Rey was awarded 30 portions.
The Kidnapping of Unkar Plutt first appeared in Better the Devil You Know, Part II a story in Star Wars Adventures 2 published on September 20, 2017.
